banner.tips: Learn more about GTech and how we solve complex challenges cross-industry with cutting-edge data technologies

technologies.text: GTech is a leading provider of cross-boundary, consolidated decentralized data solutions empowered by Web3.0 technologies. GTech’s ultimate mission is helping its customers to deliver more ‘trusted’ data to their users.

item1.title: Perseverance & Immutability
item1.text: Our solution guarantees long-term data existence, validity and tamper-proofness based on Web3 technologies, which is crucial to many business use scenarios.

item2.title: Programmable Data Privacy
item2.text: Structured, customizable data access and visibility solution ensures great data privacy under different authorization level according to business demands.

item3.title: Industry-specific Traceability
item3.text: GTech provides its customers from various industry sections with specified solutions to meet their special needs, i.e. a traceability framework for multi-tiered supply chain.

assistance.title: The Automotive Carbon Initiative, Empowered by Data Technologies
assistance.text: GTech is working closely with AIAG to help the automotive supply chain establish a shared trust data solution, Carbon3, for super-long-term carbon footprint data traceability and visibility. By providing technological support and solutions, we are helping the industry tackle the increasingly urgent carbon challenge and ultimately achieve the shared vision of the industry.

crossSolutions.title: Cross-boundary Solutions
crossSolutions.text: Learn about how GTech helps enterprises, organizations and public sectors to manage complex challenges and risks in data processing, data storage, data traceability and data visibility within diverse scopes.

item1.title: Web3-Featured Organizational Data Solutions
item1.text: GTech provides organizational-level users with data management solutions with regard to key web3 features, i.e. decentralization, data immutability, transparency and counter-SPoF. Such solution cover from the sourcing and maintenance of the data content to the regular management, storage and retrieval of the data content.

item2.title: Data Governance & BI Solutions
item2.text: Gtech’s Data Governance & BI solutions focus on the development of data strategy, the development of policies concerning the top-level design of information structures and taxonomies and the development of the data analytics system for corporates and regional industry alliances.

item3.title: Industry-specific BI & Data Solutions
item3.text: Many industrial sections, despite producing widely different products or services, are facing similar data challenges such as data credibility, data traceability and data abuse. GTech shows professionalities and insights into customizing industry-specific BI & data management solutions to meet urgent demands from cross-industries.
